dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Who dares to wander into my domain?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace, knowledge? Such futile notions! What do you truly seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand the power that dwells within these rocks.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding power, you say? You are foolish to challenge that which you do not comprehend.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for any offense. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies cannot undo your intrusion. Prepare for the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand by my curiosity. Let us learn from each other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity for knowledge, a trait I can respect. We shall see if you are deserving of it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to challenge your strength, mighty Stonecrusher!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a mere mortal. You shall regret your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not one to back down from a challenge. Let's settle this in combat!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Prepare to face the might of the rocks!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My words were spoken in jest. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Jest or not, your words have consequences. Leave while you still can.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to claim this territory as my own.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Claim this territory? You overstep, outsider. What makes you think you are worthy?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will prove my worth through strength and cunning. Stand aside or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, but actions speak louder. Let us see if you can back them up.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am ready to face whatever challenges come my way. Bring it on!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. The rocks will remember the arrogance of those who challenge them.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps I have overestimated my abilities. I will take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom prevails in retreat. The rocks shall welcome your departure.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I meant no disrespect. I will leave peacefully if you allow it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful intentions may spare you today, but remember the price of intrusion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I appreciate your mercy. I will depart now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your departure is wise. Do not test the patience of the rocks again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be threatened. I will take what I came for, by force if necessary!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. The rocks will see justice served.
